name: Education
description: Life Learning Academy is committed to creating a nonviolent community for students who have not been successful in traditional school settings. Their trauma-informed practices make it possible for students to learn, while making academics engaging. Listening to each student’s story, accepting who they are and where they are in their life’s trajectory, allows for the ability to design an individualized learning plan tailored to that young person’s needs and circumstances. howToGetIt: Give them a call! Chat for a few minutes and most likely an invite for a student-led tour will be extended along with a one-on-one interview with co-founder, Dr. Teri Delane. Interviews are usually available the same or next day. Enrollment is year round, as soon as the day after you interview. Get started: Email connect@lifelearningacademysf.org or call 415-397-8957.
